[PROMPT] EWrite a long article in [TARGETLANGUAGE] Spanish and English with a minimum of 1500 words and at least 4 headings and subheadings, including HI, H2, H3, H4 headings. Use the title: impressionism and make sure the article is informative, original, and free of plagiarism. In addition, it includes three frequently asked questions (FAQs) and a conclusion at the end of the article. The article should be written in an academic style and in a formal tone. Be sure to use bold and italics where necessary and prepare the article so that it can outrank another existing article on Google with the same search term: impressionist period. that the quality of the content is crucial, so avoid plagiarism and use remember your own writing at all times.
